info.name: Twitter Dark Wide,Night Mode / with RTL support
info.description:
TWITTER ADDED DARK MODE. NO NEED TO THIS STYLE ANYMORE!

Minimal Dark Twitter Wide Circle Avatar, No curves (no border radius)! with RTL support for Persian,Arabic languages
info.additionalInfo:
Farsi (Persian) Tweets fonts are Samim.
font page: http://rastikerdar.github.io/samim-font/

data.title: White text with white background on username mouseover?
